titulos.concurso21-10-25: LAUNCH OF THE GOOD PRACTICES FOR INCLUSION IN EDUCATION CONTEST

descripciones.descconcurso21-10-25:
On Friday, October 3, 2025, the Launch Ceremony of the Good Practices for Inclusion in Education Contest was held.
The contest seeks to promote, disseminate, and reward good practices in the educational field. A method, action, or technique that demonstrates positive results and enables all people to reach their full potential, regardless of differences. It is aimed at education professionals, interdisciplinary teams, educational institutions, advanced students, and non-formal education organizations, both in Argentina and in other Spanish-speaking countries.
The proposals may be oriented according to three axes: institutional and classroom practices; physical education and sports; and training for employment and labor inclusion. A jury of specialists will evaluate the experiences according to their impact, relevance, originality, and network articulation.
The publication of the results is scheduled for April 2026. The first prizes (1st and 2nd) will receive a financial award and the outstanding works (from 1st to 5th) will be presented at the 5th Congress on Inclusive Education.
